verses.text: \w Yet|strong="H6258"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w who|strong="H5650"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* chosen:

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* womb, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w help|strong="H5826"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w*: \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H6213"\w*, \w Jeshurun|strong="H3484"\w*, whom \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* chosen.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H7307"\w* \w thirsty|strong="H6771"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w streams|strong="H5140"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dry|strong="H3004"\w* \w ground|strong="H3004"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thine \w offspring|strong="H2233"\w*:

\w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w spring|strong="H6779"\w* \w up|strong="H6779"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w grass|strong="H2682"\w*, \w as|strong="H4325"\w* \w willows|strong="H6155"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* watercourses.

\w He|strong="H3947"\w* heweth \w him|strong="H3947"\w* \w down|strong="H3772"\w* cedars, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w taketh|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* holm \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* oak, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* strengtheneth \w for|strong="H6086"\w* \w himself|strong="H1431"\w* one among \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*: \w he|strong="H3947"\w* \w planteth|strong="H5193"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fir \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w rain|strong="H1653"\w* \w doth|strong="H3293"\w* \w nourish|strong="H1431"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H5869"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w consider|strong="H7200"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w hath|strong="H5869"\w* \w shut|strong="H2902"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*; \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w*.
